replies.txt_content:
KEI727 发表于 2011-8-23 18:35 
o.o!
thank!
Furthermore."撸过"has the same pronunciation with"路过"（although the tones aren't the same.You can ignore them）"路过"means passing.Like a signed that you have come here.
此外，”撸过“和“路过”的发音是一样的（尽管音调不一样，你可以忽略这个）路过的意思是来过这儿。就像一个标记证明你来过。。。。。
chinese is the hardest language in the world.中文是世界上最难学的语言
Don't give up！come on! you will be good at it sooner or later!但是别放弃！加油！你迟早会学会的！
Some chinese word is rude as Fword in English. Do not follow them！
有些中文的词很粗鲁。不要学他们！
